actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to permit the computation of the benefits payable to a married couple (or to the surviving widow or widower) to be made on the basis of their combined earnings.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Permits the computation of the benefits payable to a married couple under title II of the Social Security Act (Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance), or to the surviving widow or widower, to be made on the basis of their combined earnings.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to permit the computation of the benefits payable to a married couple (or to the surviving widow or widower) to be made on the basis of their combined earnings.
